resources.string: Errore di rete, controllare la connessione
You are about to calibrate this Bed Sensor.
Lift up or remove the mattress from the bed so you can see where the sensors will be.
Position the two sensors of the Zensi on the left and right side of the sleeping area, underneath the mattress and below where the hips will be.
Put the mattress back onto the bed.
This is to make sure that you can position the Sensors correctly in the next step.
"Important:\n The bed should remain empty for 2 minutes for the calibration to work! "
If any issues persist, feel free to get in touch via info@zensi.be
Important:\nPlease make sure that nobody is in bed before pressing Calibrate, otherwise the calibration will not work!
"Important:\n Sensor must be plugged in and connected to the App, and nobody can be in the bed during Calibration! "
The calibration could not be performed. This is either because your facility does not allow it or because of a server error.
Please try later or contact us at info@zensi.be
"Sensors are now underneath the mattress. Check that there is no falling risk with the cable. "
Afterwards you can use the bed as normal.

"Calibration can be used to reset the Sensor if you experience that (i) the sensor says that nobody is in bed when a patient is in it, or (ii) the sensor says patient is in bed when nobody is there. "
